name: Toy Workshop Vr
description:
You are now a TOYMAKER! Craft wooden toys in a small Workshop or in a Factory.

This Game was developed in a week for the SyncVR Hackathon using an Oculus Quest. The task was to make an application that could help during the movement rehabilitation process. 

Toy Workshop VR focuses on range of motion, specifically reaching out exercises. The game Idea was heavily inspired by the Fruit picking and conveyor belt games that were shown in the Sync VR demo video. 

Credits: 

The foundation VRIF: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/vr-interaction-framework...

Farm Models: https://quaternius.com/assets.html

Factory/other Models: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/5217

The rest of the 3d models were made by me in Blender and the rest of the programming as well.
